author: Bill Hutchinson
title: 14 inmates escape from jail amid COVID-19 shelter-in-place order
description: Fourteen inmates escaped from a Washington jail amid COVID-19 shelter-in-place order, eight were captured almost immediately, officials said.
content:
A manhunt is on in the state of Washington for six of 14 inmates who escaped from a county jail amid a coronavirus stay-at-home order from the governor, officials said.
The inmates broke out of the Yakima County Jail on Monday evening by using a table to bre… [+4161 chars]
